text: Speaking out. Actress Jameela Jamil didn ’ t shy away from publicly bashing Quentin Tarantino following news that he cast Emile Hirsch in a new project just two years after Hirsch pleaded guilty to misdemeanor assault on a female movie executive. The 32 - year - old Good Place actress took to Twitter on Friday, June 8, to share her feelings in multiple heated posts. “ Cool.
